definitions.definition: A general fact or proposition; a generality.
definitions.example: We have dealt with the generals; now let us turn to the particulars.

definitions.definition: The holder of a senior military title, originally designating the commander of an army and now a specific rank falling under field marshal (in the British army) and below general of the army or general of the air force in the US army and air forces.

definitions.example: Hannibal was one of the greatest generals of the ancient world.

definitions.definition: The head of certain religious orders, especially Dominicans or Jesuits.
A commander of naval forces; an admiral.
A general servant; a maid with no specific duties.
